DocConstant.Name: STATION
DocConstant.Documentation: Used to represent a linear location given by the linear element being measured (the _IfcAlignment_ into which the _IfcReferent_ is nested), a station value or a station equation using _Pset_Stationing_ and optionally the method of measurement (_Pset_LinearReferencingMethod_). If a linear referencing method is specified for the station, it overrides any linear referencing method specified for the alignment.
